## serverLog variable

Logs a formatted message based on the provided description, HTTP status code, and path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
serverLog: ({ description, path, statusCode, }: {
    description?: string | undefined;
    path?: string | undefined;
    statusCode?: number | undefined;
}) => void
```

## Remarks

Should only be used on the server â€” will output a warning and return early if called from the browser.
